### Welcome!    

<p class="topbr">I'm Andrew.
I'm a Ph.D. student with the [SFI Centre for Research Training in Foundations of Data Science](https://www.data-science.ie/) based in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics at the [University of Limerick](https://www.ul.ie/).
My current research is centred on a statistical-modelling approach to neural networks, with a particular focus on statistically-based model selection, uncertainty quantifiaction, and interpretation.
